intro.title: COVID-19 - information about bins, waste and recycling in Leeds
intro.description:
During the next few weeks the rest of our work is on hold and we are focusing on supporting the Council to get messages out about bin collections, recycling and waste reduction.

For the latest info re bin collections, [visit the Council's website](https://www.leeds.gov.uk/residents/bins-and-recycling).  You can also follow the Council's Leeds Recycles accounts on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/leedsrecycles) and [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/LeedsRecycles/).  

We'll be posting regular updates too on our [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/zerowasteleeds/), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/zerowasteleeds) and [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/zerowasteleeds/) accounts.

projects.title: Bin collections in Leeds
projects.description:
It's likely that bin collections will be disrupted in the coming weeks if Council staff are unable to report for work due to the COVID-19 outbreak.

To get the latest information from the Council about bin collections and other waste and recycling services, click on the link below.  

There will also be regular updates on the #LeedsBins hashtag on social media, and on all Zero Waste Leeds social media accounts.

projects.title: Zero Waste Fashion
projects.description:
Fast fashion is on the rise and causing great harm to the environment.  We’ve teamed up with the School of Design at University of Leeds and Leeds City Council to look at practical ways to reduce the impact in our city.  

Interested? Join our Fashion Hack.

tips.title: Ways to waste less in Leeds

hire.title:
Need help? 
 Hire us!
hire.description:
We know there are lots of organisations in Leeds who want to reduce their waste or help the people they work with reduce theirs.

That’s something we can help with. We support businesses, event organisers, schools and communities on their zero waste journey.

join.title: Join our movement
join.description: Every step of our journey we’re uncovering more people in Leeds who are curious, serious or passionate about reducing their waste. If you’re one of those people, join us.
